title: Survey on streaming data computing system
abstract: In the era of big data, as the data has been developed to be more and more streaming, the value produced by that has increased considerably, therefore contributing to the creation of a large number of computing platforms. Besides, because the traditional big data computing technology is unable to meet the needs of this innovation, a great deal of new technologies have been created rapidly. Based on that background, this paper analyzes the distinctive characteristics of streaming data, and enumerates and compares five widely used technology platforms based on their system architectures, usage scenarios, advantages and drawbacks.

journal.name: Proceedings of the ACM Turing Celebration Conference - China
